scripts.dev: npm run kill-ports && npm run supabase:check && concurrently "npm run build:functions" "npx wrangler pages dev dist --compatibility-date=2024-01-01 --compatibility-flags=nodejs_compat --port=8788 --local" "npm run dev:flutter"
scripts.dev:full: npm run kill-ports && npm run supabase:check && concurrently "npm run build:functions" "npx wrangler pages dev dist --compatibility-date=2024-01-01 --compatibility-flags=nodejs_compat --port=8788 --local" "npm run dev:flutter" "npm run dev:admin"
scripts.dev:api-only: npm run kill-port:8788 && concurrently "npm run build:functions" "npx wrangler pages dev dist --compatibility-date=2024-01-01 --compatibility-flags=nodejs_compat --port=8788 --local"
scripts.dev:flutter-cloud: cd mobile-client && cp .env.production .env && flutter run -d chrome --web-port 8081
scripts.dev:flutter-cloud-server: cd mobile-client && cp .env.production .env && flutter run -d web-server --web-port=8081
scripts.flutter:cloud: npm run kill-port:8081 && npm run dev:flutter-cloud
scripts.flutter:cloud-server: npm run kill-port:8081 && npm run dev:flutter-cloud-server
scripts.kill-ports: npm run kill-port:8788 && npm run kill-port:8081
